data.name: Detailed information on why you think a partnership with EcoBoost would be mutually beneficial for yourself and the Neo ecosystem.
data.value: 详述您方会如何与 EcoBoost 实现共赢

data.name: Detailed information outlining:
data.value: 详情简介:

data.name: EcoBoost
data.value: EcoBoost

data.name: EcoBoost could provide…
data.value: EcoBoost 可以提供：

data.name: EcoBoost Partners
data.value: Ecoboost 合作方

data.name: EcoBoost partners are leveraged to provide full lifecycle support to Neo projects, based on the individual requirements of each project. For example, media partners can assist with outreach and publicity, exchange partners can help list tokens and stimulate liquidity, and institutional partners can provide industry resources.
data.value: EcoBoost 合作方会根据不同 Neo 项目的具体需求为其提供全周期支持。例如，媒体合作方可以协助进行外联和宣传，交易所合作方可以帮助上市代币和刺激流动性，公共机构合作方则可以提供行业资源。

data.name: EcoBoost partners will benefit from business growth opportunities provided by access to the Neo ecosystem and its global community.
data.value: 同时，EcoBoost 合作方也将从 Neo 生态系统及其全球社区提供的业务增长机会中受益。

data.name: Educational organization
data.value: 教育组织

data.name: Exchange
data.value: 交易

data.name: First announced at Consenus 2019, EcoBoost is a US $100 million initiative designed to grow the Neo ecosystem.
data.value: 2019 年，Neo EcoBoost 计划在全球瞩目的 Consensus 大会上首次公布。该计划总斥资一亿美元，旨在促进 Neo 生态系统的发展。

data.name: Full lifecycle support, including funding, technology support, community access, and marketing assistance
data.value: 全周期支持，包括资金、技术支持、社区权限和市场援助

data.name: Funding of up to US $50,000
data.value: 最高达 5 万美元的资金支持

data.value: 如何申请

data.value: 您认为 EcoBoost 计划可以怎样帮您实现您的目标?您需要何种支持？

data.value: 如果您认为您的项目能受益于 EcoBoost 计划的支持，请联系 NGD EcoGrowth 部门并提供以下信息:

data.name: Operated by the Neo Global Development EcoGrowth department, the program works by building up a partner network to provide assistance to Neo-based projects.
data.value: EcoBoost 计划由 Neo Global Development（NGD）生态增长（EG)部门负责运营，运作机制是通过建立合作网络，为基于 Neo 的项目提供援助。

data.name: Opportunity to grow your business through exposure to the Neo ecosystem
data.value: 通过 Neo 生态系统发展业务的机会

data.name: The Neo Global Development EcoGrowth team will work with EcoBoost partners and projects to ensure mutually beneficial outcomes for all participants.
data.value: NG-EG 团队将与 EcoBoost 合作方和项目方精诚合作，携手共赢。

data.name: Wallet
data.value: 钱包

data.name: We are very proud of the partners in our EcoBoost network and the projects that we have supported. We’d love to add your name to the list.
data.value: 我们因 EcoBoost 网络的合作方和支持项目而自豪。希望能将您的名字也添加到名单上。

data.name: Working in tandem with various partners, the EcoBoost program provides full lifecycle support for high-potential projects.
data.value: Neo EcoBoost 通过多方合作，为高潜项目提供全周期支持。

data.name: Working together
data.value: 合作

data.name: Your unique value proposition
data.value: 您的独特价值观
